stickers.name: amiya_stare
stickers.alt: Amiya stares down at something with a blank expression. According to Xue, she says, 'Mm (yes).'

stickers.name: amiya_search
stickers.alt: Amiya looms over the viewer, her face covered in a dark shadow. According to Xue, she says, 'Are you here?'

stickers.name: doctor_amiya_pat
stickers.alt: Doctor comfortingly pats the head of a fretting Amiya. According to Xue, the words above them are a 'pat pat' sound effect.

stickers.name: doctor_rise
stickers.alt: Doctor lays in bed, their hands folded on their chest. Although their face is totally obscured by their helmet, two white dots indicate their eyes are wide open and they are wake. According to Xue, the words next to them say, 'I RISE.'

stickers.name: amiya_nah
stickers.alt: Amiya holds up her right hand, waving it side to side in polite declination. According to Xue, she says, 'That's not the case.'

stickers.name: amiya_think
stickers.alt: Amiya looks down in thought. She holds her chin between the thumb and index finger of her right hand, while crossing her left arm across her chest. Above her is the sound effect 'mmm...'

stickers.name: feater_complain
stickers.alt: FEater has her eyes closed in dramatic agony as she loudly complains. According to Xue, she says, 'I'm always dealing with the shit end of the stick'

stickers.name: doctor_sleep
stickers.alt: Doctor lays in bed, their hands folded on their chest. According to Xue, the words next to them say, 'sleep like the dead.'

stickers.name: specter_maniac
stickers.alt: The image is zoomed in on Specter's maniacal grin and red eyes. A third of the image is filled a sound effect. According to Xue, the sound effect is along the lines of 'HAHAHAHAHA!!'

stickers.name: specter_tired
stickers.alt: Specter lies face down like a starfish while holding her bonesaw in her hands. The text above her consists of the English word 'lay' and a Chinese character. According to Xue, this is a pun on 'lying down' in English and 'tired' in Chinese. Properly translated as a whole, it would be, 'passed out'

stickers.name: myrhh_nom
stickers.alt: Myrrh chews a tuft of grass in her mouth. According to Xue, the sound effect is 'nom.'

stickers.name: 12f_confused
stickers.alt: 12F looks at a smart phone in his right hand in confusion and distress. Several question marks around his head convey his struggle.

stickers.name: kal_glug
stickers.alt: Kal'tsit has her left hand on her hip while she uses her right hand to chug from a mug. According to Xue, the sound effect is 'glug glug glug'

stickers.name: kal_attack
stickers.alt: Kal'tsit dramatically points to attack something while Mon3tr looms over her shoulder. A red gleam over Mon3tr's head threatens danger. According to Xue, Kal'tsit says something along the lines of, 'Get them.'

stickers.name: kal_trouble
stickers.alt: A shadow of dread falls over Kal'tsit's stoic face. A visual effect indicates that Kal'tsit has sensed someone getting into trouble that needs to be scolded.

stickers.name: admins_return
stickers.alt: Kal'tsit and Amiya walk away from the viewer. The Doctor is being dragged between them by their arms, Kal'tsit on their right and Amiya on their left. According to Xue, the words beside them read, 'Returning.'
